# rafay_blueprint (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rafay_blueprint" "blueprint" {
  name         = "rctl-test-blueprint"
  projectname  = "dev3"
  yamlfilepath = "<file-path/blueprint.yaml>"
  description  = "blueprint with terraform provider"
  yamlfileversion = ""
}
```
